sentence.Network_en: To the children, their father's study was the holy of holies.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这些孩子的眼里, 父亲的书房是最神圣的地方.

sentence.Network_en: I saw him go into the Holy of Holies a while ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 我刚才看见他走进了厕所.

sentence.Network_en: Nippur's Holy of Holies is defiled.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼普的神圣中的神圣地位受到污染.
